statements: SELECT * FROM leadership_project_milestones;
SELECT project_name, completion_date FROM leadership_project_milestones WHERE milestone_id = 1;
SELECT milestone, outcome FROM leadership_project_milestones WHERE project_name = 'Project X' ORDER BY completion_date DESC;
SELECT milestone, outcome, completion_date FROM leadership_project_milestones WHERE project_name = 'Project Y' AND milestone LIKE '%Launch%';
SELECT milestone, completion_date FROM leadership_project_milestones WHERE completion_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT milestone_id, project_name, completion_date FROM leadership_project_milestones WHERE project_name = 'Project A';
SELECT * FROM leadership_project_milestones WHERE completion_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY completion_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, milestone FROM leadership_project_milestones WHERE milestone LIKE '%delivery%';
SELECT * FROM leadership_project_milestones WHERE completion_date < '2022-06-30' AND project_name = 'Project B' ORDER BY milestone_id ASC;
SELECT project_name, COUNT(milestone_id) AS total_milestones FROM leadership_project_milestones GROUP BY project_name HAVING total_milestones > 3 ORDER BY total_milestones DESC;
SELECT * FROM leadership_projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM leadership_projects;
SELECT project_name, leader_name FROM leadership_projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, end_date FROM leadership_projects WHERE leader_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM project_outcomes;
SELECT project_name, leader_name, start_date, end_date FROM leadership_projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM leadership_projects WHERE leader_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT project_name, MIN(start_date) AS earliest_start_date, MAX(end_date) AS latest_end_date FROM leadership_projects GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT lp.project_name, po.outcome_description, po.outcome_date FROM leadership_projects lp JOIN project_outcomes po ON lp.project_id = po.project_id;
SELECT project_name, leader_name, start_date, end_date FROM leadership_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC, project_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM LeadershipProjects;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM LeadershipProjects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT milestone_name, milestone_date FROM ProjectMilestones ORDER BY milestone_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, rating FROM PerformanceEvaluation WHERE project_id = 3 AND rating > 3;
SELECT project_name, completion_date FROM LeadershipProjects WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM LeadershipProjects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM LeadershipProjects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date FROM LeadershipProjects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProjectMilestones WHERE project_id = 2 AND completed = true;
SELECT eval_id, rating FROM PerformanceEvaluation WHERE project_id = 3 AND rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM leadership_projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM leadership_projects WHERE leader_id = 5;
SELECT leader_id, project_name, outcome FROM leadership_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, leader_id, start_date, end_date FROM leadership_projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, outcome FROM leadership_projects WHERE end_date < '2021-12-31';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM leadership_projects WHERE leader_id = 1;
SELECT milestone_name, milestone_date, completion_status FROM project_milestones WHERE project_id = 3 ORDER BY milestone_date DESC;
SELECT participant_name, role, hours_worked FROM project_participants WHERE project_id = 2 AND role = 'Developer';
SELECT project_name, leader_id, outcome FROM leadership_projects WHERE project_id = 4;
SELECT milestone_name, milestone_date, completion_status FROM project_milestones WHERE project_id = 1 AND completion_status = 'Complete';
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, project_leader, start_date, end_date FROM projects;
SELECT milestone_id, milestone_name, project_id FROM milestones ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_description, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE project_leader = 'John Doe';
SELECT employee_name, employee_position FROM employees WHERE employee_department = 'Marketing';
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, project_leader FROM projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT project_name, project_description, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE project_leader = 'John Doe' AND end_date <= '2023-01-01';

SELECT p.project_name, m.milestone_name, o.outcome_description FROM projects p INNER JOIN milestones m ON p.project_id = m.project_id INNER JOIN outcomes o ON m.milestone_id = o.milestone_id WHERE p.project_name LIKE '%Data%' ORDER BY o.outcome_date DESC;

SELECT e.employee_name, e.employee_department, p.project_name, m.milestone_name, e.employee_position FROM employees e LEFT JOIN projects p ON e.employee_id = p.project_id LEFT JOIN milestones m ON p.project_id = m.project_id WHERE e.employee_department = 'Engineering' AND m.completed_date IS NULL ORDER BY e.employee_name ASC, m.deadline_date ASC;
